full_summary:
=====================================

> **Tender Announcement**
>
> **Title:** A.7 Programmer / Analyst
>
> **Reference Number:** PW-23-01027382
>
> **Solicitation Number:** 22-58141
>
> **Publication Date:** February 23, 2023
>
> **Tender Closing Date:** March 20, 2023 (11:00 AM)
>
> **Contract Description:**
>
> The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) invites proposals for the provision of Programmer/Analyst services to support their Microsoft Power Platform-related development efforts.
>
> **Scope of Work:**
>
> The selected vendor shall provide three (3) dedicated Programmer/Analyst resources to support the NRC's ongoing projects, with a focus on the Microsoft Power Platform.
>
> **Tender Requirements:**
>
> The vendor must demonstrate expertise in:
>
> 1. Microsoft Power Platform development
> 2. Visualization and reporting
> 3. Data analysis and management
>
> **Contact Information:**
>
> For more information, please contact:
>
> Roxanne Azzi Abboud
>
> roxanne.azziabboud@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
>
> 613-299-9650
>
> **Secondary Contact Information:**
>
> 1200 Montreal Road
>
> Ottawa, ON, K1A 0R6, Canada
>
> **Inquiries:**
>
> Send your inquiries to Roxanne Azzi Abboud via email to roxanne.azziabboud@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
_> 
>

=====================================================================
